The Hungarian Energy and Public Utility Regulatory Authority (HEA) is authorized to request both occasional and regular information from licensed companies, entities required to register their activities, companies conducting pilot projects, and producers of domestically produced natural gas. This authorization is detailed in the Natural Gas Supply Act of 2008 (Act XL of 2008), specifically under section s) paragraph sc) on page 130/165. This provision allows the HEA to fulfill its responsibilities in overseeing natural gas supply, ensuring the security of natural gas supply, ensuring the efficient operation of the natural gas market, enforcing the requirement of equal treatment, and fostering effective competition.
